titleStmt.title: A proclamation against conventicles, and other disorders.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Blank spaces intentionally placed in text.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh, the first day of March, 1676. And of Our Reign the twenty eight year.
Signed at foot of text: Tho. Hay, Cl. Sti Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
